channel.title: 金融时报

item.title: 在英国工党领袖基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的领导下，我们有可能瞥见重新构想脱欧解决方案的第一步

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京表示，如果 "俄罗斯国家的存在 "受到威胁，或者 "我们的主权和独立受到损害"，俄罗斯已经 "准备好 "进行核战争。"武器就是用来使用的"。
item.description:
Vladimir Putin has said Russia is “prepared” for a nuclear war if there is a threat to the “existence of the Russian state” or “damage to our sovereignty and independence”, as outlined in Russia’s nuclear doctrine.
“Weapons are there to be used.”https://t.co/x78HBCp1lK

— max seddon (@maxseddon) March 13, 2024

item.title: 海丝特的故事并不难处理，但唐宁街却把它弄得很难处理。这让议员们不禁要问，苏纳克和他的团队将如何应对选举。今天的文章将对此发表一些看法：
item.description:
The Hester story is not difficult to handle, yet Downing Street is making it so. It leaves MPs wondering how Sunak and his operation will handle an election. Some thoughts on that in today’s note: https://t.co/7vXNq8Ef3z

— Stephen Bush (@stephenkb) March 13, 2024

item.title: 我对特朗普过去 5 天的看法。欧尔班、Tik Tok U-turn、9100 万美元债券、RNC 大清洗、Kimmel、希特勒新部下、J6 特赦，等等。他的谎言值得耸耸肩，其他人的都是丑闻"。其他人的谎言都是丑闻"。 为什么民主会在特朗普式的无聊中消亡？
item.description:
Me on Trump's last 5 days.. Orban, Tik Tok U-turn, $91m bond, RNC purge, Kimmel, new Hitler detail, J6 pardon & on & on. "Call it the banality of chaos..His lies merit a shrug. Everyone else's is a scandal". Why democracy dies in Trumpian boredom. https://t.co/x64TlC9KPM

— Edward Luce (@EdwardGLuce) March 13, 2024

item.title: 民主死于特朗普式的无聊
item.description:
Democracy dies in Trumpian boredom https://t.co/Z99epXd2oD

— Financial Times (@FT) March 13, 2024

item.title: 日本工人获得了几十年来最大的一次加薪。然而，即使通胀压力下降，企业仍有可能面临加薪要求。原因就在这里：
item.description:
Japanese workers have secured their biggest pay rise in decades.

However even as inflation pressure declines, companies are still likely to face demands to raise wages. Here’s why: https://t.co/E8f86Tbf3n pic.twitter.com/eFeC79vkdm

— Financial Times (@FT) March 13, 2024

item.title: 您对金钱和投资有什么疑问？我们的消费者编辑 @ClaerB 想听听您的意见！格林尼治标准时间今天下午 1 点，加入她在 Reddit 上的 "Ask Me Anything"，或提前发送您的问题：
item.description:
What questions do you have about money and investing?

Our consumer editor @ClaerB wants to hear from you! Join her on Reddit at 1pm GMT today for an 'Ask Me Anything' or send in your questions in advance: https://t.co/Z9NrlTpbkH pic.twitter.com/67QVeUR8CS

— Financial Times (@FT) March 13, 2024

item.title: 虽然年轻人生活在冲突和难民营中，但这并不意味着他们没有繁荣社区的梦想。@RabinaKhan通过@ft为我们的繁荣城市系列报道。
item.description:
